diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Cholelithiasis with gallstone pancreatitis; Chronic cholecystitis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with epigastric pain radiating to the back after a history of heartburn, and ultrasound findings showed several gallstones in the gallbladder without wall edema, indicating cholelithiasis. The associated symptoms of cramping pain and the history suggest gallstone pancreatitis.
